name: OCTA INNOVATION
goal:
Eurecna has been set up as a global company in the following sectors:
1. Programmes of technical assistance and development cooperation;
2. Web-based portals and systems for e-business and e-government;
3. Energy produced from renewable resources.

Eurecna has been awarded a technical assistance contract by the European Commission for a four-year period (from April 2014 – March 2018) for the implementation of the “Territorial Strategies of Innovation” project (TSI). The overall objective of the project is to enhance sustainable development through innovative solutions for economic diversification and to improve regional and global competitiveness of the Overseas Countries and Territories (OCTs).
interests: Communication, Development, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Europe 2020 initiative “Innovation Union”
EU initiatives for research and innovation
Social Innovation Europe
Energy Policy
OCT-EU relations
Regional integration
Research, education and innovation
Climate change, Biodiversity
Main EU programmes of interest for OCTs: H2020, Erasmus+, COSME, Life+
